summary: This is an internal email forwarding a news article about a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case. It was sent from a contractor to multiple recipients within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

events.title: Epstein hearing
events.description: A hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case, as reported by the Miami Herald.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated June 25, 2019, discussing a hearing in the Epstein case.
The email forwards a link to a Miami Herald article about the hearing.
The communication is between individuals within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
The sender is identified as a contractor and the recipients are listed with placeholder identifiers (USANYS).
